Package AcademicExchangePlatform.dao

Class UserDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
AcademicExchangePlatform.dao.UserDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserDAO
public class UserDAOImpl extends Object implements UserDAO
Implementation of the UserDAO interface. Provides methods to create, update, retrieve, and manage users.
